statements: SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor_info;
SELECT * FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_amount > 5000;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contract_amount FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT vendor_name, contract_end_date FROM vendor_info ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_amount FROM vendor_info WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp' AND contract_amount > 10000 ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contract_amount FROM vendor_info WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%' AND contract_end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendor_info WHERE contact_person = 'Alice' OR contact_person = 'Bob' AND contract_start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contract_amount FROM vendor_info WHERE contract_start_date < '2023-01-01' AND contract_end_date IS NULL ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_contact, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_value > 50000;
SELECT contract_id, contract_start_date FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_contact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendors;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, total_value FROM contracts WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, unit_price, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT contract_name, total_value FROM contracts WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM vendors JOIN contracts ON vendors.vendor_id = contracts.vendor_id;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, unit_price FROM resources WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_description, start_date, end_date FROM vendors JOIN contracts ON vendors.vendor_id = contracts.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM vendors JOIN contracts ON vendors.vendor_id = contracts.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_description, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT procurement_id, resource_name, quantity FROM procurement JOIN resources ON procurement.resource_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_rating > 4;
SELECT contract_name, contract_value FROM Contract WHERE contract_value > 10000;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resource ORDER BY resource_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Procurement WHERE procurement_status = 'Approved';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM Vendor;
SELECT * FROM Contract WHERE contract_value > 100000;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resource ORDER BY resource_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_rating > 4.5;
SELECT contract_name, contract_value FROM Contract WHERE contract_details LIKE '%important%';
